page.title: 20CUSTOMS
page.content: CUSTOMS.Annual Rememberance Day Service. Most groups participate. Woburn Sands Peace Group hold a Silent Vigil in the village centre followed by a public meeting on the Saturday nearest to Remembrance Day EASTER Two ceremonies take place at this time. Good Friday -an Act of Witness in the village centre and an orange roll after morning service on Easter Day. Beating the Bounds.This is carried out annually in Aspley Guise only. GHOSTS. The ghost of Dick Turpin is reputed to ride on horseback through Weathercock Lane He is said to be looking for two friends who were murdered and bricked up in a wall of a Coaching Inn. A private house occupies the site of the inn. The rates have been reduced because of the ghost.
